title: Did he ask the Bahamians who fled Dorian to leave a package to Florida because they didn't have visas?
subtitle: The answer relates to confusion and poor communication rather than new visa requirements.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Bahamians were forced to flee the destruction of Hurricane Dorian in the late summer of 2019 to leave a boat for the United States because they did not receive visas.
